channel.title: Torchwood: Miracle Day
channel.description: So, the first episode of Torchwood: Miracle Day recently broadcast. I was wondering what you guys thought about it and how it compared to the previous seasons. :freeman:

item.title: Torchwood: Miracle Day
item.dc:creator: David
item.description:
Sees thread about Torchwood

So far it’s good, but I’m pretty sure that they’ve gotten a push to blow more things up.
That’s really all I can say…

Read full topic

item.title: Torchwood: Miracle Day
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
I’ve watched both episodes so far. Even the dude that got blown up didn’t compare to the shock value of Jack getting blown up and regenerating IMO.

TGP, yes it is a Doctor Who spinoff. Jack got his immortality in the end of the first season.

Read full topic

item.title: Torchwood: Miracle Day
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
xalener:

American versions always suck.

Only the office was okay, and that was shit when it started.

Uh? It’s not an American version. It’s the same central cast (with a few more for this season) with the same production crew as every other season. It’s just set (and only for a few episodes) in America because of where the funding for the season came form.

Read full topic

item.title: Torchwood: Miracle Day
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
American versions always suck.

item.title: Torchwood: Miracle Day
item.dc:creator: TheeGoatPig
item.description:
I never watched the previous seasons. I never knew there were previous seasons until after I watched it. I only watched it because I thought the black guy was Chiwetel Ejifor (it’s not). I was upset when I realized that it wasn’t.

Is this a Doctor Who spinoff? I don’t think I care anymore.

Read full topic
